text: Tempi (, ) is a municipality in the Larissa regional unit, Thessaly, Greece. The seat of the municipality is the town Makrychori.Kallikratis law Greece Ministry of Interior The municipality was named after the Vale of Tempe. ==Municipality== The municipality Tempi was formed at the 2011 local government reform by the merger of the following 5 former municipalities, that became municipal units: *Ampelakia *Gonnoi *Kato Olympos *Makrychori *Nessonas ==References== Category:Municipalities of Thessaly Category:Populated places in Larissa (regional unit)
title: Tempi (municipality)
